H0.text: Which country used to be called Southern Rhodesia. Zambia

H1.text: Which country used to be called Southern Rhodesia. Zimbabwe

H2.text: Which country used to be called Southern Rhodesia. Botswana

H3.text: Which country used to be called Southern Rhodesia. ZWE

A4.text: Zimbabwe was formerly known as Southern Rhodesia (1898), Rhodesia (1965), and Zimbabwe Rhodesia (1979).

A5.text: A peace agreement in 1980 established de jure sovereignty as Zimbabwe, following the end of white minority rule.
